name: Giuseppe Ricciardi

projects.title: 3D Shape retrieval
projects.description: View-based descriptor system for 3D shape retrieval using GoogleNet.

projects.title: Segmentation on CityScape Dataset with CGAN
projects.description: Implementation with PyTorch of CGAN for Segmentation, the results are compared with a U-Net

projects.title: Data Augmentation with GAN
projects.description: Use of different models of GANs for data augmentation task

projects.title: C++ online compiler
projects.description: An online clang compiler using wasm
